channel.title: Pong
channel.description: this may be the wrong section if it is feel free to move it whereever it goes. Well simple really i made a game of pong and then made a 2 player version in flash thought i would release because well i was bored. Anyway the two player has some bugs in it that i can't fix till next monday. the mian problem is this: player two can't go left whilst player 1 goes right or left otherwise the game ends :) good ain't it? this is because the controls for player 2 are the Ctrl key and the Alt key. The 1 player version has 3 difficulties and the right hand wall doesn't actually exist for paddles only for the ball :D don't know why just does. Its attached Hyper Pong is the next installment so look out for that

this may be the wrong section if it is feel free to move it whereever it goes.
Well simple really i made a game of pong and then made a 2 player version in flash thought i would release because well i was bored. Anyway the two player has some bugs in it that i can’t fix till next monday. the mian problem is this: player two can’t go left whilst player 1 goes right or left otherwise the game ends good ain’t it? this is because the controls for player 2 are the Ctrl key and the Alt key. The 1 player version has 3 difficulties and the right hand wall doesn’t actually exist for paddles only for the ball don’t know why just does. Its attached Hyper Pong is the next installment so look out for that
